    Resources

    Jodi Wilkins

    Pennsylvania Licensed Professional Counselor

    • Havertown, PA
    • Email

    These are several valuable resources available online:

    ADHD
    • CHADD - Children and Adults with Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder
    Anxiety

    • National Institute of Mental Health - Information on Anxiety

    Meditation
    • Tara Brach - a series of guided meditations
    Wellbeing

    • Greater Good Science Center - from UC Berkeley

    • Brene Brown has written many helpful books on shame and embracing imperfections

    Neuroscience of Happiness
    • Rick Hanson has written about neuroscientific ways to cultivate happiness
    PA Crisis Hotlines
    • List cultivated by PA Department of Human Services
